basicInfo.name: Rakan Douli
basicInfo.title: Technical Project Lead | Senior Full-Stack Developer
basicInfo.summary: I am a Full-Stack Developer with a Bachelor of Business Administration and over 10 years of experience in international business operations and software development. I specialize in building complex React/Next.js platforms (like Shambay) while ensuring the technology solves real business problems. With a background in B2B account management and financial reporting, I am at my best bridging the gap between technical execution and business goals. Multilingual in Arabic, English, and Dutch.

items.title: Technical Project Lead / Senior Full-Stack Developer
details: Led the end-to-end technical strategy and architectural design for Shambay (shambay.com), an enterprise-grade Arabic marketplace platform.
Managed the full-stack development lifecycle using Next.js, NestJS, and GraphQL, coordinating 40+ database entities and 155+ migrations.
Oversaw the design of 12 admin dashboards featuring RBAC permissions, real-time search, and AI-driven moderation tools.
Architected automated business logic for professional advertising packages and tiered subscription billing systems.
Directed multi-environment infrastructure deployment using Docker on Hetzner and Vercel, ensuring high availability and data security.

items.title: Freelance Full-Stack Developer
details: Consulted on and co-developed full-stack solutions including a voting platform (Vue/NestJS) and an NFT generator (React/Flask).
Managed client requirements and project delivery for multiple high-performance web applications.
Engineered custom WordPress architectures and optimized SEO visibility through structured data and performance tuning.

items.title: Full Stack Developer
details: Developed and maintained internal management applications using Vue.js and Laravel in a headless setup for B2B operations.
Resolved critical bugs and implemented features for internal tools to optimize high-trust business workflows.
Optimized the shop app frontend through API-driven updates, ensuring data consistency across decoupled systems.

items.title: Full Stack Developer
details: Built and maintained features for headless B2B Agri-tech applications using React, Node.js, and GraphQL.
Led performance load testing for database gateways with JavaScript, identifying and resolving bottlenecks in data-heavy environments.
Streamlined decoupled data flows, resulting in a 30% reduction in load times for enterprise users.

items.title: Full Stack Developer
details: Developed reusable React/Next.js components in a headless architecture for global brands like Vodafone and Burger King.
Managed Contentful CMS integrations and GraphQL data delivery to optimize frontend performance.
Implemented A/B testing strategies for high-traffic E-commerce platforms, driving measurable conversion growth.
Designed and deployed responsive HTML templates for Vodafone NL to enhance customer communication.

items.title: Sales Specialist
details: Exceeded sales targets through persuasive communication and high-quality customer service in a fast-paced retail environment in Utrecht.

items.title: Account Manager
details: Managed 50+ key customer accounts, overseeing payment processing, invoicing, and high-level client relations.
Leveraged SAGE software to optimize inventory and financial reporting, increasing team productivity by 50%.

items.title: Sales Promoter
details: Directed the television section's inventory and sales strategy, awarded 'Best TV Sales Promoter' for peak performance.
